Class TotalisticRule

java.lang.Object
Rule
TotalisticRule
public class TotalisticRule extends Rule
TotalisticRule represents any one of the 64 rules that govern the evolution of totalistic CAs.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Joshua Wiseman
